programme.title: Cockneys vs Zombies
programme.desc: A gang of bank robbers fight their way out of a zombie-infested London.

programme.title: Black Sabbath [Italian Language Version]
programme.desc: Boris Karloff hosts a trio of horror stories concerning a stalked call girl, a vampire-like monster, and a nurse who is haunted by her ring's rightful owner.

programme.title: Frankenstein Meets the Space Monster
programme.desc: When an atomic war on Mars destroys the planet's women, it's up to Martian Princess Marcuzan and her right-hand man Dr. Nadir to travel to earth and kidnap women for new breeding stock.

programme.title: Hush
programme.desc: A deaf and mute writer who retreated into the woods to live a solitary life must fight for her life when killer appears at her window.

programme.title: Munchies
programme.desc: An archaeologist finds a strange creature in Peru and takes it home. He dubs the creature a `Munchie', but is unprepared for the ensuing chaos when the beast starts to mutate.

programme.title: Ed And His Dead Mother
programme.desc: A mourning son makes a deal to reanimate his one year dead mother.

programme.title: Blue Eyes Of The Broken Doll [English-Language Version]
programme.desc: An ex-convict, troubled by dreams that he strangles women, is hired as the caretaker. Soon after his arrival, a serial killer begins slaughtering women.

programme.title: Vampire Circus
programme.desc: As the plague sweeps the countryside, a quarantined village is visited by a mysterious traveling circus. Soon, young children begin to disappear, and the locals suspect the circus troupe might be hiding a horrifying secret.

programme.title: Rabid (2019)
programme.desc: After underoing a facial reconstruction procedure, a demure woman becomes the carrier for a contagion that causers her lovers to become violent spreaders of death.

programme.title: The Devil Bat
programme.desc: A mad scientist develops an aftershave lotion that causes his gigantic bats to kill anyone who wears it.

programme.title: The Slumber Party Massacre (1982)
programme.desc: When Trish (Michele Michaels) decides to invite her teammates over for a slumber party, she has no idea the night is going to end with an unexpected guest.

programme.title: Slumber Party Massacre II
programme.desc: A teen and her friends are terrorized by a rock star whose guitar is fitted with a drill bit.

programme.title: MST3K: Blood Waters Of Dr. Z
programme.desc: Seeking revenge against those responsible for stripping him of his tenure and the denial of human research subjects, Dr. Z mutates himself into a half-human-half-fish-like creature!

programme.title: Piranha (1995)
programme.desc: A government tank containing genetically engineered piranha is unwittingly emptied into a river that flows past a resort area.

programme.title: Ben
programme.desc: Ben the rat returns to lead a violent rodent army in this 1972 horror sequel to "Willard."
